styles.heading: text-pink-900
styles.borderInput: border-pink-300 focus:border-pink-400 focus:ring-pink-400 focus:ring-offset-white focus-within:ring-pink-500 focus-within:border-pink-500
styles.dropdownButton: border border-pink-200 bg-white shadow-sm hover:bg-pink-50 hover:border-pink-300 text-pink-700 focus:outline-none
styles.bgPopover: bg-white/95 backdrop-blur-md border border-pink-100 shadow-xl rounded-xl
styles.codeTagStrong: border border-pink-300 text-pink-900 bg-pink-100 font-medium rounded
styles.tagButton: cursor-pointer border text-pink-700 border-pink-200 hover:bg-pink-50 hover:border-pink-300 transition-all bg-white/60
styles.tagButtonActive: border border-pink-400 text-pink-900 bg-pink-100 transition-all font-medium
styles.tagLabel: text-pink-800 border border-pink-200 bg-white/80 shadow-sm transition-all
styles.tagLabelHover: hover:bg-pink-50 hover:text-pink-900 hover:border-pink-400 hover:shadow shadow-sm transition-all
styles.infoCard: rounded-xl bg-white/90 border border-pink-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow transition-shadow
styles.card: rounded-xl bg-white/95 border border-pink-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all
styles.cardTitle: border-b border-pink-100 bg-pink-50/80 text-pink-950 font-medium rounded-t-xl
styles.cardActive: rounded-xl shadow-md bg-white border border-pink-400 ring-1 ring-pink-200 transition-all
styles.cardActiveTitleBar: border-b border-pink-200 bg-pink-100/50 text-pink-950 font-semibold rounded-t-xl
styles.textBlock: backdrop-blur-sm bg-white/40 rounded-lg p-2 border border-pink-100/50
styles.primaryButton: border border-transparent shadow-sm text-white bg-pink-500 hover:bg-pink-600 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-pink-400 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed transition-all font-medium rounded-md
styles.secondaryButton: text-pink-700 bg-white/90 border border-pink-300 shadow-sm hover:bg-pink-50 hover:border-pink-400 transition-all font-medium rounded-md
styles.textLink: text-pink-600 underline decoration-pink-300 underline-offset-2 hover:text-pink-800 hover:decoration-pink-500 transition-colors
styles.chatButton: border border-pink-200 text-pink-600 bg-white/90 shadow-sm hover:bg-pink-50 hover:border-pink-300 hover:shadow hover:text-pink-700 disabled:text-pink-300 disabled:bg-gray-50/50 disabled:border-pink-100 disabled:shadow-none disabled:cursor-not-allowed transition-all rounded-full
styles.voiceButtonDefault: bg-white/90 text-pink-400 border border-pink-200 shadow-sm hover:text-pink-600 hover:shadow hover:bg-pink-50 hover:border-pink-300 transition-all rounded-full
styles.voiceButtonRecording: border rounded-full bg-rose-100 border-rose-400 text-rose-600 shadow-inner animate-pulse
styles.voiceButtonProcessing: bg-pink-100 text-pink-600 border border-pink-300 rounded-full shadow-sm animate-spin
styles.tabButton: text-pink-600/80 hover:text-pink-900 hover:bg-pink-100/60 rounded-md transition-all font-medium
styles.messageUser: bg-slate-100/90 backdrop-blur-sm text-slate-800 border border-slate-400/60 shadow-sm rounded-2xl
styles.messageAssistant: bg-pink-100/90 backdrop-blur-sm text-pink-900 border border-pink-300 shadow-sm rounded-2xl
